name: Deep Space (itch) (Rockclaw)
description:
Deep Space was created in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. It's a twist on a simple Bullet Hell where you fight a stationary enemy by keeping a constant line of connection to it, dodging projectiles and keeping away from it's shields.

How to Play

  • Use the mouse to navigate
  • Stay tethered by avoiding the shields
  • Dodge projectiles to stay alive

Credits

  • Coded by Tyler S.
  • Art by Stevie P. & Edan A.
  • Original music by Kieran D.
  • Sound effects created with SFXR
